name: Job Colors for WP Job Manager Categories
author: Myles McNamara

sections.description:
Select the color of each existing job category in the Job Listings’ settings. Can set the color to be the background color, or text color.

Features

  • Set color as background
  • Set color as text
  • Job Category public functions

Requires

  • WP Job Manager by Mike Jolley

Recommended

  • Job Colors for WP Job Manager Types by Astoundify
  • Jobify WordPress Theme by Astoundify

Documentation

Documentation will be maintained on the GitHub Wiki here.

Contributing and reporting bugs

You can contribute code and localizations to this plugin via GitHub: http://github.com/tripflex/wp-job-manager-cat-colors

Original Sources

  • Job Colors for WP Job Manager Types by Astoundify

Support

If you spot a bug, you can of course log it on Github

Or contact me at myles@smyl.es
sections.installation:
1. Install and Activate
  2. Go to “Job Listings > Settings > Job Category Colors” and set colors.
sections.changelog:
1.1: Feb 12, 2014

  • Add more information under usage tab

1.0: Feb 9, 2014

  • First official categories release

short_description: Change a job category color without editing CSS.
